002// Open Source Software; you can modify and/or share it under the terms of

004
005package edu.wpi.first.wpilibj2.command;
006
007import java.util.Collections;
008import java.util.HashSet;
009import java.util.Set;
010
011/**
012 * A CommandGroup that runs a set of commands in parallel, ending when any one of the commands ends
013 * and interrupting all the others.
014 *
015 * <p>As a rule, CommandGroups require the union of the requirements of their component commands.
016 *
017 * <p>This class is provided by the NewCommands VendorDep
018 */
019public class ParallelRaceGroup extends CommandGroupBase {
020  private final Set<Command> m_commands = new HashSet<>();
021  private boolean m_runWhenDisabled = true;
022  private boolean m_finished = true;
023
024  /**
025   * Creates a new ParallelCommandRace. The given commands will be executed simultaneously, and will
026   * "race to the finish" - the first command to finish ends the entire command, with all other
027   * commands being interrupted.
028   *
029   * @param commands the commands to include in this group.
030   */
031  public ParallelRaceGroup(Command... commands) {
032    addCommands(commands);
033  }
034
035  @Override
036  public final void addCommands(Command... commands) {
037    requireUngrouped(commands);
038
039    if (!m_finished) {
040      throw new IllegalStateException(
041          "Commands cannot be added to a CommandGroup while the group is running");
042    }
043
044    registerGroupedCommands(commands);
045
046    for (Command command : commands) {
047      if (!Collections.disjoint(command.getRequirements(), m_requirements)) {
048        throw new IllegalArgumentException(
049            "Multiple commands in a parallel group cannot" + " require the same subsystems");
050      }
051      m_commands.add(command);
052      m_requirements.addAll(command.getRequirements());
053      m_runWhenDisabled &= command.runsWhenDisabled();
054    }
055  }
056
057  @Override
058  public void initialize() {
059    m_finished = false;
060    for (Command command : m_commands) {
061      command.initialize();
062    }
063  }
064
065  @Override
066  public void execute() {
067    for (Command command : m_commands) {
068      command.execute();
069      if (command.isFinished()) {
070        m_finished = true;
071      }
072    }
073  }
074
075  @Override
076  public void end(boolean interrupted) {
077    for (Command command : m_commands) {
078      command.end(!command.isFinished());
079    }
080  }
081
082  @Override
083  public boolean isFinished() {
084    return m_finished;
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public boolean runsWhenDisabled() {
089    return m_runWhenDisabled;
090  }
091
092  @Override
093  public ParallelRaceGroup raceWith(Command... parallel) {
094    addCommands(parallel);
095    return this;
096  }
097}
